name: The Greatest Story Ever Told 2
description:
(WARNING, THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR THE HELL OF IT ONLY AND SHOULDNT BE TAKEN ALL TOO SERIOUSLY.

WARNING 2, YOU MIGHT WANNA PLAY THE FIRST GAME BEFORE THIS ONE, ALTHOUGH IT ISNT NEEDED TO UNDERSTAND MOST THINGS IN THIS ONE. TGSET 1 IS AVAILABLE ON ITCH.IO ONLY SINCE ITS LIKELY NOT GOOD ENOUGH TO BE ACCEPTED HERE.

WARNING 3, THERE ARE FLASHING LIGHTS IN PARTS OF THIS GAME, THERES ALSO ALOT OF VULGAR LANGUAGE AND LOUD DUMB NOISES SOMETIMES.)

SUMMARY:

TGSET 2 is a slightly more Grezzo 2/Postal 2 inspired sequel to an RPGMXP Game made by some jackass with too much free time on the summer and a trial of RPGMXP. TGSET 1 was a bit lacking and this sequel aims to keep and ramp up the stupidity of its predecessor while also bringing an assload of more stuff.

The Guy is back again to deliver an ass kicking of astronomical proportions!

After going through hell, heaven and back in TGSET 1 he got jailed for something he did.

Now everyone loves cereal, especially The Guy so he decides to escape prison and get some cereal to go along with his milk.

With a new prisoner friend by his side, The Guy will have to fight his way through the bullshit of the town i couldnt be bothered with naming.

FEATURES:

- A variety of music and asstets stolen from different sources

- Stupidly overpowered weapons at parts

- 2 Paths filled with the most unexpectedably (or however you spell it) dumb shit you can imagine

- Plenty of various enemies

- The ability to piss in battle and outside of battle. this is my favorite feature.

- Possibly some "so bad its good" value.

If you like total stupidity and crudely vulgar "humor" with a little bit of hell and abstractness (is that even a word? not sure), this game is for you. if not, you should probably still play it. 

A DLC is planned for the game (dont worry, it will be free) to expand on the strange world of the town with no name, so look out for that.

!!!IF  YOU PLAYED THIS, PLEASE LEAVE FEEDBACK! I LOVE SEEING FEEDBACK WHETEVER POSITIVE OR NOT :)!!!
